title: Slums shall mean those censused, or declared and notified, in the past or hereinafter under the Slum Act
clause_text: Slums shall mean those censused, or declared and notified, in the past or hereinafter under the Slum Act. Slum shall also mean area/pavement stretches hereinafter notified or deemed to be and treated as Slum Rehabilitation Areas.
section: Definition of Slum, Pavement, and Structure of hut

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
